author: Special Correspondent
text:
Students participating in a letter writing competition organised by the Department of Posts at Presentation Convent Girls Higher Secondary School in the city on Sunday.– Photo: M. Periasamy

As many as 135 students from different schools in the city took part in the UPU letter writing competition organised here on Sunday by the Department of Posts.

The students, aged between five and 15 years, wrote a letter for maximum 1,000 words and they had an hour to complete it.

Every State will select three letters and send it for national selection. The students had to write a letter addressed to themselves. The topic was given to them earlier, said an official of the department.
title: Letter writing contest for students
